description: Bergenia 'Herbstblute' AUTUMN GLORY, or pigsqueak, is a unique and striking plant species that is sure to wow any garden or landscape. Pigsqueak produces an abundance of bright pink, rosette-shaped flowers in the spring. In the fall, its glossy green leaves turn a deep bronze color, creating a stunning show of color. It requires low maintenance and tolerates a wide range of soils, making it easy to cultivate. Pigsqueak is also deer-resistant, making it an ideal plant for rural gardens. Its evergreen foliage keeps it looking lush year-round, providing an interesting texture to any outdoor space. With its low maintenance and remarkable colors, pigsqueak is the perfect addition to any garden.
